history.proof: intros H1 H2 x y H; apply subrel_preorder in H. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros H1 H2 x y H; apply R1_or_R2 in H.
exceptions.exn: The reference R1_or_R2 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros H1 H2 x y H; apply subrel_preorder in H.
exceptions.tactic: destruct H as [H | H]; [left | right]; now apply (H1 _ _ H).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel B B H1 : Symmetric R1 H2 : Symmetric R2 H, y : A H0 : R1 H y The term "H" has type "A" while it is expected to have type "R1 ?x ?y".

original: intros H1 H2 x y H; apply R1_or_R2 in H. destruct H as [H | H]; [left | right]; now apply (H1 _ _ H).
